trait.name: Languages
trait.text: Duergar begin play speaking Common, Dwarven, and Undercommon. Duergar with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Aklo, Draconic, Giant, Goblin, Orc, and Terran.

trait.name: Duergar Immunities
trait.text: Duergar are immune to paralysis, phantasms, and poison. They gain a +2 racial bonus on saves against spells and spell-like abilities.

trait.name: Stability
trait.text: Duergar receive a +4 racial bonus to their CMD against bull rush or trip attempts while on solid ground.

trait.name: Enlarge Person Spell-Like Ability (Sp)
trait.text: A duergar can use enlarge person once per day, using its character level as its caster level and affecting itself only.

trait.name: Invisibility Spell-Like Ability (Sp)
trait.text: A duergar can use invisibility once per day, using its character level as its caster level and affecting itself only.

trait.name: Superior Darkvision
trait.text: Duergar have superior darkvision, allowing them to see perfectly in the dark up to 120 feet.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
trait.text: Duergar are dazzled in areas of bright light.

trait.name: Blood Enmity (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: Duergar have long warred against their dwarven cousins and the hated drow. Duergar with this racial trait receive a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the dwarf or elf subtypes. This racial trait replaces the invisibility spell-like ability.

trait.name: Daysighted (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: The cruel light of the sun harms some duergar less than others. Such duergar lack the light sensitivity racial trait, but have darkvision of only 60 feet.

trait.name: Deep Magic (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: Duergar spellcasters labor long to overcome the inborn spell resistance (SR) held by so many of their underground foes. Duergar with this racial trait receive a +2 racial bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance and a +2 racial bonus on dispel checks. This racial trait replaces the enlarge person and invisibility spell-like abilities.

trait.name: Dwarf Traits (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: Duergar can select any dwarf racial trait that replaces stability. They can select dwarf racial traits that replace the hardy dwarf racial trait by giving up duergar immunities instead.

trait.name: Magical Taskmaster (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: Some duergar demonstrate magic of a more insidious kind than the rest of their kin. They can use charm person once per day as a spell-like ability. The save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 duergar’s Hit Dice + duergar’s Wisdom modifier. This racial trait replaces the invisibility spell-like ability racial trait.
